ygData.subject: New songs?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just got this from the Concert Hall MB, from the newest Test Server spdate.eff: 51 Largo s Absonant Binding- decreases agi by 45, attack speed by 30%, movement
ygData.messageBody:
Just got this from the Concert Hall MB, from the newest Test Server
spdate.eff:

51 Largo's Absonant Binding- decreases agi by 45, attack speed by 30%,
movement 52%, ac 16pt

51 Selo's song of Travel- speed increase of 66%, levitate, see invis,
invisbilty

52 Nillipus' march of the wee- increases ac by 10, increases agi by 18, 12pt
hp asorbtion

53 Song of Dawn (nothing yet)

53 Song of Twilight- decreses MR by 14

54 Selo's Assonait Strane- decreases movement by 43%, decreases attack speed
by 23%

54 Vilia's Chorus of Celerity- increases attack speed by 45%

55 Cantana of Replenishment- increases hp's by X (dunno number), increases
mana by 12 (better than clarity II)

56 Song of Midnight- Fear, decreases Hp's by X, increases movement by 45%

56 Song of Highsun- cancel magic x2, stuns, shadow steps

57 Casindra's Insipid Ditty- decreases mana by 15, decreases Intelligence
and Wisdom by 15

57 McVaxius' Rousing X- increase attack speed by 21+%, increases str by 20,
increases attack by 13, damage shield for 8pts

58 Niv's Harmonic X, 24 AC
